DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the degree of post-operative ocular inflammation in patients who are undergoing a pars plana vitrectomy.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Ocular Inflammation in Patients Undergoing a Pars Plana Vitrectomy
DOC.criteria: Require pars plana vitrectomy in at least 1 eye Best corrected visual acuity in the study eye between 20/400 and 20/40 Use of any NSAIDs (topical or systemic) within 14 days Use of topical or systemic steroids within 30 days Active eye infection in either eye Any eye surgery within 6 months Prior pars plana vitrectomy, YAG capsulotomy or uveitis
